subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Rangers’ Henrik Lundqvist reached 30 victories for the fourth straight season, and the Devils’ Martin Brodeur is one victory away from tying Patrick Roy’s N.H.L. record for career victories by a goaltender.
snippet: The Rangers’ Henrik Lundqvist reached 30 victories for the fourth straight season, and the Devils’ Martin Brodeur is one victory away from tying Patrick Roy’s N.H.L. record for career victories by a goaltender.
